options.content:
----
## Open Digital Aquaculture
----
Select the device you want to calibrate from the drop-down list and follow the instructions for each of its sensors. You should set the sampling rate for the sensors of this device to a value of 5s, to be able to see real-time changes while you calibrate.

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM messages WITH KEY="publisher" WHERE "devname" =~ /^$Device$/
list.label: ID
list.name: Publisher
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM messages WITH KEY="publisher" WHERE "devname" =~ /^$Device$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM messages WITH KEY="devname"
list.label: Device
list.name: Device
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM messages WITH KEY="devname"
